The `convert_bodymaps` function converts mislabeled female CHOIR bodymaps to a standard for multiple gender analysis of CHOIR data. 

Given example data:  
|---|---|
|GENDER|BODYMAP|
|Male|112,125|
|Female|116,117|
|Female|128,117|
|---|---|
